item.title: Philip Morris International Inc 10-K
item.description: Philip Morris International Inc, which is in the Cigarettes [2111] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 10, 2023 had 55321 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 614 instances pmi - 491 instances products - 425 instances 2021 - 418 instances 31 - 408 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
